Policy

22.01.2024 15:13

There was a video of the destruction of the rotation of the U.S. artillery

During the attack, one of the two Ukrainian groups attempted to escape by leaving the bodies of their dead comrades, possibly the remaining wounded.

22.01.2024 14:57

The expert proposed a $500 million oligarham to TSB

Igor Korotchenko, editor-in-chief of the National Defence magazine, proposed the need for " nationalization of elites " and the establishment of the Special Fund for SVS.

22.01.2024 14:03

CEC has issued documents to register Vladimir Putin as a presidential candidate

Vladimir Putin ' s registration documents were formally accepted by the Centre as a candidate for the upcoming presidential elections in March.

22.01.2024 13:34

Vladimir Zelensky signed a decree on the historically settled lands of Russia by Ukrainians.

Full title: " The historically populated territories of the Russian Federation " .

22.01.2024 13:21

Head of the Hungarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs on EU assistance to Ukraine: It's an old psychosis.

The head of the Hungarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs highly appreciated the European Union ' s initiative to provide five billion dollars for military assistance in his X account.

22.01.2024 12:27

An American compromise can destroy the career of Zelena.

The head of the Russian Foreign Intelligence Service, Sergei Narashkin, said that the U.S. authorities ' trade in Vladimir Zelenski could destroy him as President.

22.01.2024 12:23

Experts: The new US war in the Middle East can affect Russian consumers

In America, a plan for a massive war against the Husit had been established, after many days of bombings had failed to stop attacks from Yemen on ships in the Red Sea. The development of the conflict in the region can paralyse the movement on the Suez Canal first and then the Ormuz Strait. The experts assessed how this could affect Russia.

22.01.2024 11:58

Tina Candelaki became non-access to Kazakhstan

A representative of Ibek Smadiarov, MFA, made a statement.

22.01.2024 10:56

Sholtz's party payroll to 13 percent.

Political measurements were carried out by the INSA Sociological Institute, commissioned by Bild am Sonntag.

22.01.2024 10:27

The United States has moved to a colonial administration in Ukraine

The United States has moved to the establishment of a colonial administration in Ukraine, and is informed by the Foreign Intelligence Service of the Russian Federation.

22.01.2024 10:09

The strike in Finland will affect the supply of arms to Ukraine

The country ' s industrial union appointed a strike from 1 to 2 February 2024.

22.01.2024 10

In Russia, references were made to the improvement of the aircraft.

The Russian Air Force is constantly improving, new aircraft are being developed, and Victor Bondarev ' s first premier of the Defence and Security Council Committee has announced.

22.01.2024 09:38

Lavrov arrived in New York to discuss conflicts in the Middle East and Ukraine

The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia, Sergey Lavrov, arrived in New York, where he would participate in the activities of the United Nations Sobezia.

22.01.2024 09:32

Vladimir Zelensky went to the opposition, Donald Trampu

Vladimir Zelensky spoke about Donald Trampa ' s announcement of his intention to conclude the conflict quickly in Ukraine.

22.01.2024 09:16

On Donetsk, a mobile bunker defended FAF soldiers from firing.

Experimental mobile bunker-closing saved the lives of six Russian fighters, defending them when they were fired on Donetsk, and informed the director of the Dorguetoth Company, Alexei Devilov.

22.01.2024 08:48

Vladimir Putin ordered the search for the property of the Russian Empire abroad.

The head of Russia has issued a decree to finance the search for Russian State property abroad.

22.01.2024 08:45

Turkey reported the pressure of the West due to relations with Russia

In Turkey, private business is under unprecedented pressure by the West on sanctions against Russia. In particular, problems are encountered with transactions via SWIFT.

22.01.2024 08:27

Ryabkov commented on the balance of forces with the adoption of the Saramt compound

The Sarmat launch this year does not change the " strategic equation " in relation to America, by the head of the MFA, Sergei Riyabkov, of the Sarmat missiles.

22.01.2024 08:12

The U.S. commented on whether Putin would pick up the phone when Tramp called.

President Vladimir Putin would not have responded to the call of the ex-Chief of Donald Trampa State if he had called him right now to resolve the conflict in Ukraine, a former U.S. intelligence officer, Scott Ritter.

22.01.2024 07:42

The Minoboro told me about the hijacking of the team site during the release of Veselho.

The Ministry of Defence has published a handful of UPU troops at the Vesloye village release in the NPD, and has revealed details of release.

22.01.2024 07:24

Israel overlooked the Zaharova Holocaust

The use of the Holocaust in the context of Israel ' s operation in the Gaza Strip was inappropriate, and the representative of Israel, Lior Hayat, said.

22.01.2024 07:07

In Belarus decided to change the military doctrine

In the new military doctrine of Belarus, potential attacks on Minsk's allies will be similar to the attack on the country itself. This was stated by the Chief of Information and Analysis of the Genstab of the Armed Forces, Artem Buthorin.

22.01.2024 07:05

European Union wants to set up a fund to help Ukraine bypass the Hungarian wind.

The European External Relations Service is developing a new assistance plan for Ukraine.

22.01.2024 06:28

Nikki Hayley said he'd continue the race against Tramp.

The only competitor of ex-President Donald Trump in the fight for Nikki Haley's republication said he intended to defeat him.

22.01.2024 05:43

The Ukrainian Navy ships in Sevastopol will not be handed over to the Black Sea fleet, but recycled.

The remaining ships in the Sevastopol of the Ukrainian Navy will not be transferred to the Black Sea Navy, and will be dismantled.
